app.username.missing: Oh no! You don't have a username yet. Please choose one to continue. You can only view your posts after choosing a username.
form.title: Viajei.blog

form.username.help: Your username will be used to access your travel page, you can only change it once, so choose wisely!

form.error.email.notValid: This is not a valid email address
form.error.password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
form.error.login.generic: Unable to log in, please try again
form.signUp.description: Sign up for free and start sharing your stories with the world
signUp.needToVerifyEmail: An email has been sent to the registered address, please check your email as soon as possible to confirm your account.
createStory.sample.paragraph: Hello, welcome to the Viajei.blog story editor. Here, you can create your travel stories and share them with the world. To get started, hover over me, and you'll see a menu of options on the left. Use it to add images, links, and more. Give it a try!
createStory.sample.heading: Create titles and lists like this:
createStory.sample.paragraph2: Starting from your third post, we won't show this tutorial anymore! Don't forget to delete these example blocks we left here. To do that, follow the steps shown in the image below:
createStory.sample.image.caption: Next to the add button, you'll find the option to edit the block you're working on. If it's a title, you can change its size and importance (Heading 3, Heading 4, ...). By the way, here's the caption for your photo :) in case you want to add one.
createStory.form.tripDuration: Start and End of the Trip
createStory.form.city: City or Location of the Trip

mainCard.personalBlog: Go to your personal trips page
mainCard.setUpProfile: Click here to set up your profile
settings.noAvailable: Map, color, and font customizations are not available yet!
